author: John R
comment: Just got 1 bulb to try. Well love it! Easy setup. Easy integration with Alexa. Super rich in features. Still exploring them. I would definitely recommend these. But as I may want more controlled lights, I have to decide if I want to switch to hub based solution. Certainly the color realism blows the others away. Ok price for the bulb, but 39 instead of 53 woul be better, but what the heck

author: griffin thomas
comment: I have this app rated 5, however I deleted my rating to put a one because of the horrible new adaptation of the app. It is difficult to use the lights look a lot worse because of the switching between lights the modes are horrible and not customizable at all. If you're going to add new things at least give us the ability to change back to the way we liked it.

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi Griffin, We're sorry to hear that you don't like the new version of the app.  If you'd like to elaborate on what we've changed that you don't like, please contact support@lifx.com and we'll try to fix it up.  We are currently working on adding more customizable options in the next release.

comment: Hardly ever works. I have to restart app several times before the bulb gets detected. Very frustrating. My WiFi settings and signal are all good and I tried it on 2 different devices. Seems to be getting worse and worse. Full of annoying ads. UPDATE: completely useless. Worse than ever. I would give it -5 stars id I could. Don't bother

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi, Thanks for the feedback.  We will be looking at improving the options that are available for custom animations in a future release.

author: Josh Siegel
comment: App has come a long way. If you have a dual band router and you're having connectivity issues, hide the SSID of the band the bulb is not using. DEVELOPERS: please work with Automateit devs to fix plugin and keep it from crashing.

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi Josh, We're sorry to hear that your scenes have disappeared.  If you contact support@lifx.com our support team can investigate whether this is an app issue or something has happened to your account that would cause this problem.

author: Nick McGonegal
comment: Recent updates have done nothing but ruin the integrity of this app. It constantly disconnects my light randomly and can never "re-find" it. When it works it does its job pretty well but its just to unreliable to get a better rating. Going with the more expensive but trustworthy company like Phillips Hue is a far better idea for anyone wanting this technology.

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi Nick, Thanks for your feedback.  We are continually working to reduce the crash rate of the app and fix bugs in each app release.  If you have any specific bugs to report, please contact support@lifx.com and we will make sure to get them fixed in the next release.

author: Roy Fussell
comment: Frequent poor connection and lag on the software side. Not a fan of how the update split the white and color wheels - far less simple.  A shame that the bulbs are a definite 5/5 and I struggle to give the app a 2/5 rating.

author: Jason S
comment: Post update infrared doesn't work. Main reason why I paid $80+ for the lifx+. Fairly useless to me now. Fix and five stars. Especially since there aren't many other options for ir bulbs. Update, after 30 minutes to an hour of tampering with it and deleting it/adding it again I had to disable night vision and re enable it for it to work. At least temporarily..

author: Ryan Marshall
comment: I LOVE my lifx,I'm up to 4 now and the color is so deep and saturating that you get some amazing effects in drawings and paintings and photos! Paired with IFTTT,the lights are maintenance free,other than the occasional update,and it's always nice to have the lights turn on for you automatically after a long day or coming home in bad weather.Lifx are a wonderful addition to anyone's life too I've gotten my parents a bulb and my housemate has three of his own as well! I wish I could go on,but I'm out of space

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi Ryan, Thanks for the kind review.  If there is anything we can do to earn that last 1/2 a star, let us know.

author: Curelea Stefan
comment: I dont like that you have to be connected to the cloud and GPS at thecsame time while you are trying to link the bulbs. This is very stupid. Other than that the app looks ok.

author: Tuukka Rinkinen
comment: Lifx lights are the absolute worst option for connected lights. I made the mistake of buying a bunch, and they randomly keep getting disconnected, resulting in all automation being gone until you do a full reset, and even that only fixes them for a few hours. Their customer support won't admit the problem and they're doing absolutely nothing to fixit.  Worst thing since Neato.  How about having the lights reconnect when they lose connection to the cloud? How is that not a basic feature in _any_ device that's supposed to be connected?

author: Timur Dincer
comment: Not good for multiple lights.  Lots of issues. Groups don't set correctly. Light still shows old group.  Group list isn't alphabetically sorted in the schedule settings.  Doesn't work with wifi extenders.

author: Daniel Souza
comment: Bulbs are amazing but the app is always spotty when it comes to staying connected to the bulbs. I also used to be able to control them when I want home but the recent update won't let me anymore.

author: Jeff Fennell
comment: I just reset my wifi network recently and now re -adding bulbs fails every time

author: Blake Stokes
comment: Love my lights.... haven't had any issues that weren't easily remedied ☺

author: Randy Barran
comment: Great strip lights but I lose connection on my s7.. I have to force close the app and reopen to reconnect. Still love the lights and iOS app works good on ipad

author: Michael Young
comment: App works well, love the black theme. Just wish the actual bulbs would go dimmer than they do now. 1% is too bright to sleep with so I have to rely on my bathroom light on with the door closed.

author: Shawn Williams
comment: One minute it's working fine, after two days it's not working at all, it says it's offline when the tablet is on line and all other apps are working. Lights won't operate.

author: Robert Soughton
comment: Got 2 in the bedroom, great when they work. But they never seem to work. 80% of the time they don't respond, or only one of the two do. . . .please help or sort it out Lifx!

author: Mark-Anthony Ojeda
comment: Works great when the app actually works. App continues to crash when it launches.

author: Tony Godfrey
comment: Widget works fine on galaxy s7 but won't work properly on Nokia 8 with Oreo 8.1 always have to open app to get widget to refresh

author: Ivan Valentinov
comment: It force closes all the time. This is the third time I will be reinstalling the app

author: Nandogg 2024
comment: Apple iOS had a more better music effects android has less?
Issues with searching for light bulbs

author: Lee Williams
comment: Never crashed, never lost connection, amazing bulb

author: junior arevalo
comment: they are fun but now the app has ads

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi Junior, Thanks for your feedback.  We will be adding more customisation options in the coming releases so will be able to turn off the marketing messaging if you want.

author: Toby G
comment: See's WiFi network. See's the light bulb. Connects to light bulb just fine. Keeps checking firmware on light, outs a check mark, then updates the light, puts a check mark, then does it again over and over. Until it gives an update failed message and tells me to reset my light. I've tried everything. If I could get my money back for this useless bulb I would.

author: Mitcho
comment: Was told to get a lifx, nothing but issues with it. App stops picking it up and after a day or 2  I have to reconnect it... Waste of money and time. Sadly not able to return it or I would. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY

author: James Chapman
comment: No time or patience for poor engineering. Just as the others have commented, connectivity issues continuously throws me into an endless loop of frustration rendering this app useless. This should be an easy, frictionless experience. Instead it's a huge disappointment. I'll change my review if it gets fixed. Otherwise it's going back to the store.

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi James, We're sorry to hear that you've been having connectivity problems with your lights.  If you contact support@lifx.com our support team can help resolve this issue.

author: Alchemic Overdrive
comment: The constant updates have made my light unrecognized by the app. The updates made it worse than it was. Whilst I prefer the app that was made for the lights, I've found an app called "ONSWITCH" works every time. Which is kinda sad considering this app is literally made for my lifx light. Also, I see no real point in their attempt to sell color schemes ,considering you can manually make them such a color.  Fix your s#it! Until you do  I'll be using alternative apps that work better for my light .

author: Errol Cileli
comment: Tired of fussing with program that is only good for upselling but when I try to connect to bulb/lamp just crashes. Can't get the lamp to do anything that my standard LED bulbs don't do. What a waste of money. Lifx is off my list.

author: Bryan Danson
comment: I love the lights, but the app for Android isn't great. Keeps changing my wake up schedule and occasionally is unresponsive. My gfs Apple app and my Kindle app work great. Same with my old Android phone.

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi Bryan, We're sorry to hear that your wake up schedule isn't working reliably and you've been having connectivity problems.  If you contact support@lifx.com our support team can help resolve these issues.

author: Daniel Jaffe
comment: These lights and the stupid app are so buggy. Seriously don't even bother with this company.

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi Daniel, We're sorry to hear that you've been having trouble with your lights.  If you contact support@lifx.com our support team can help resolve these issues.

author: Bertha Barnes
comment: no I would not recommend it to anyone explanations setup is not easy to follow I do a lot of programming I'm not the smartest but  I'm not dumb. I just paid $70.00 for an ordinary A19 light bulb why do I care about cloud and data and airplane mode  all I want is to have Alexa to turn my light on and off

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi Bertha, We're sorry to hear that you've been having trouble with your lights.  If you contact support@lifx.com our support team can help resolve these issues.

author: Alex Christaki
comment: I wish this app would just work as it should... !!!!!  Adding a light is buggy, gets into a loop, and when asked to connect directly doesn't show an SSID and that's as far as it gets every single frigging time.

author: Travis Rauh
comment: LIFX is fantastic, but newest app is buggy. Constant connectivity issues requiring hard restart of phone to work again.

author: Ghost ITC
comment: You need to do better then just to use  your Internet connection waste of time going over the process everytime I  connect. Please fix this.

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi Ghost ITC, We're sorry to hear that you've been having connectivity problems with your lights.  If you contact support@lifx.com our support team can help resolve this issue.

author: Jerry Denton
comment: Fix your connectivity issues. Useless app right now.
Has to reconnect multiple times, it's a hassle. I don't recommend it to anyone.

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi, We're sorry to hear that you've been having trouble with your lights.  If you contact support@lifx.com our support team can help resolve these issues.

author: Dan Turner
comment: Setup on Android was just awful until finally managed to upgrade firmware
I love it but it be nice to have more theams like it would be awesome to have a northern lights theam

reply.author: LiFi Labs Inc.
reply.content: Hi, Thanks for the feedback.  We will be adding more themes and customization options for colors and themes in the coming releases.
